name: Skill Showdown
description:
A local 2 player game. You can play this game using keyboards or gamepad.

A top-down 3D local 1v1 game, where 2 players need to traverse through the map in order to fight one another. Players will need to manage their skills as it does not come often! Knockback your enemies to gain space, set up traps to deal damage, or defend yourself from deadly attacks. Be the one to survive and gain the title of Champion! 

Controls (keyboard):

Player 1/2:

  • Movement: WASD / PL;'
  • Dash: Q / O
  • Knockback: E / [
  • Skill1: 1 / 0
  • Skill1: 2 / -
  • Skill1: 3 / =

Controls (gamepad):

  • Movement: Joystick
  • Dash: R1
  • Knockback: X
  • Skill1: Triangle
  • Skill1: Square
  • Skill1: Circle
